attributes.action: Change the law, so the Local Authority have a duty of care to the parents.
attributes.additional_details:
Legal representatives, solicitors and barristers.
Complaints department North East Lincolnshire Council
Local Government Ombudsman investigation into a complaint against North East Lincolnshire Council (reference number :13 003 200).
Consultant Clinical Psychologist ( For counselling regarding post natal depression)
Grimsby combined Courts
Lincoln County Court
Nottingham Justice Center.
This is just some of the people/organizations i have been involved with.
attributes.background: In 2012 I was suffering with post natal depression. I rang my local Social Services department asking for help. I told two social workers that I felt I didnt want to live anymore. They walked out and left my baby and i without any help or support. This has led to ongoing catastrophic events.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like Parliament to change the law.
